flawed_nl_solution:
George picked at first 12 because 36 / 3 = <<36/3=12>>12.
George picks 22 by the end because 12 + 10 = <<12+10=22>>22
Billy picks 46 by the end because 36 + 10 = <<36+10=46>>46
In total they picked 86 because 22 + 46 = <<22+46=86>>86
On average they picked 43 because 86 / 2 = <<86/2=43>>43
#### 43

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 68, not 86. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
